title: CIVILITIY, No More
body_text:
EVENT BACKGROUND
East Coast Dodgeball
made its long-awaited return to the Wall High School battlegrounds following a brief hiatus during the rather calm and snowless 2011/2012 Winter season.
WORLD TOUR
was placed in a standard evening timeslot on Saturday, April 7, 2012, making it the remarkable 168th event held on the said day of the week. Event announcements and invitations were made possible via Facebook and text message.
MAIN ATTRACTIONS
Three main attractions* were showcased throughout the near four-hour WORLD TOUR presentation.
The first of these was the ultra-rare
HitTheHuman Contest
, a special pre-match competition absent since
June 2008
. In the end, 2011 sensation
Joanice Lima
deservingly captured the championship against an impressive 16 other contenders. As per tradition,
ECDElite
Hall of Famer Justin Pierce served as the "victim" for the game.
Upon the completion of the
HTH Contest
, the more recognized
Rimshot Contest
title was up for grabs. With an even more staggering 17 opponents,
ECDElitist
Justin Wolf
came out triuphant.
As a result of their victories, the newly-crowned contest champions formed two formidible squads to kick-start the predominant match of WORLD TOUR. By the 10pm mark, Team ONE escaped with 5 total wins to Team TWO's 3.
*It should be noted that while a Battle Royal was scheduled, the unusually long duration of both accuracy-testing contests scrapped the idea.
STATISTICAL SIGNIFICANCE
Twenty-one
(21) participants helped establish a strong attendance in the 2012 opener. No new players were recorded.
Joanice Lima became the first woman in
ECD
history to win the
HitTheHuman Contest
.
Justin Wolf's
Rimshot Contest
victory was also one for the record books as he joins an exclusive list - John Tronolone, Ryan Letsche, Diana DiBuccio - to win both a
Rimshot Contest
and
a
Battle Royal
(earned in April 2008). Additionally, he was the 1st
ECDElitist
to claim the contest crown post-induction.
________________________________________
_____________________
The Engagement Ring, The Wedding Ring, The Suffering.
FATAL ATTRACTION
is coming MAY 12, 2012!
body_html:
• EVENT BACKGROUND
    East Coast Dodgeball made its long-awaited return to the Wall High School battlegrounds following a brief hiatus during the rather calm and snowless 2011/2012 Winter season.

    WORLD TOUR was placed in a standard evening timeslot on Saturday, April 7, 2012, making it the remarkable 168th event held on the said day of the week. Event announcements and invitations were made possible via Facebook and text message.

  • MAIN ATTRACTIONS
    Three main attractions* were showcased throughout the near four-hour WORLD TOUR presentation.

    The first of these was the ultra-rare HitTheHuman Contest, a special pre-match competition absent since June 2008. In the end, 2011 sensation Joanice Lima deservingly captured the championship against an impressive 16 other contenders. As per tradition, ECDElite Hall of Famer Justin Pierce served as the "victim" for the game.

    Upon the completion of the HTH Contest, the more recognized Rimshot Contest title was up for grabs. With an even more staggering 17 opponents, ECDElitist Justin Wolf came out triuphant.

    As a result of their victories, the newly-crowned contest champions formed two formidible squads to kick-start the predominant match of WORLD TOUR. By the 10pm mark, Team ONE escaped with 5 total wins to Team TWO's 3.

    *It should be noted that while a Battle Royal was scheduled, the unusually long duration of both accuracy-testing contests scrapped the idea.

  • STATISTICAL SIGNIFICANCE
    Twenty-one (21) participants helped establish a strong attendance in the 2012 opener. No new players were recorded.

    Joanice Lima became the first woman in ECD history to win the HitTheHuman Contest.

    Justin Wolf's Rimshot Contest victory was also one for the record books as he joins an exclusive list - John Tronolone, Ryan Letsche, Diana DiBuccio - to win both a Rimshot Contest and a Battle Royal (earned in April 2008). Additionally, he was the 1st ECDElitist to claim the contest crown post-induction.

    _____________________________________________________________

    The Engagement Ring, The Wedding Ring, The Suffering.
    FATAL ATTRACTION is coming MAY 12, 2012!
